title: Unjustified ban
body:
I just received the most unjust ban.
I just worked 9 hours in the day, I log on to have a fun game of Ezreal to play the new re-work in a normal game, and someone on my team banned him. I decided to teach that degenerate a lesson about being a decent human being and then I receive a ban? You're kidding me? What is his penalty? He takes away my fun but I get banned? What a load of crap. This company and its goal of achieving a non-toxic community is a joke.

replies.body:
>I decided to teach that degenerate a lesson about being a decent human being and then I receive a ban? 

Do you truly feel that this is an appropriate response to someone banning a champion that they have every right to ban? Sure it's bm if you have it intent picked, but often it's just they don't want to play with it. 

I hate Ezreal, I hate versing him and I hate playing with him, and he regularly sees the business end of my ban hammer. While personally I don't ban intent picks no matter how much I might want to, some people make the choice that the fun they lose isn't worth a second pref pick from someone on their team. 

To be immediately labelled a degenerate for that? In a normal? That seems rather harsh.

Regardless, there isn't much feedback the community can give you without your actual chat logs, so if you want anything specific, I'd recommend posting them. If you want to appeal your punishment, you can submit a ticket to Player Support and they'll review it: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
